name: Custom Couple Embroidery - Made to Order
description:
Handmade embroidered baby shower gift, anniversary gift, wedding gift, couples portrait, animal portrait, family portrait, kids portraits.

A custom heirloom embroidered couple portrait featuring two hand embroidered names and animals of your choice. (can also use "sisters", "brothers" "best friends", "in love", "together forever", etc. 

This portrait comes on a LARGE embroidery hoop
Stitched on organic muslin fabric
STEP 1. Choose your colors pallet, OR let me choose
STEP 2. Choose your animals and facial expressions
STEP 3. Choose up to 4 words (want more? message me)
STEP 4. Choose MUSTARD YELLOW organic muslin or NATURAL
STEP 5. Enter all of this info in the message to seller when checking out. If you have additional requests please send me a message.

FOX
BUNNY
RACCOON
WOLF
OWL
SKUNK
BEAR
BIRD
DEER
CAT

Want a different animal? That will cost you more, as I will have to come up with a new design. The animals listed above are animals I have drawn a lot and they come easy to me. Any other animal may cost more. 

Want a smaller hoop size? Message me for a price quote on something smaller.

*Please note: The font I used to write the names on the embroidered artwork was done on a computer and not by hand. Please expect your custom names to look handwritten. This is not my handwriting. but I will make it look as pretty as possible for you! :) * 

Embroidery hoop measures 7"

name: Stewart Sunshine the fox
description:
Stewart Sunshine loves to spend his afternoons outside on his lovely hammock where he tells stories to the sparrows. The sparrows love Stewart and look forward to his stories. 

Measurements :15 inches long, 10 inches from tail to toe.

Made to order, please allow 2-3 weeks for your item to be made

name: Liam the Fox
description:
I met this feisty little fox in the depths of the thick forest one afternoon while I was gathering pine cones. He asked me for a ride down to the city where he could find a nice family that would be willing to take him in as a stray. I did just that and here we are now. I am looking for a nice home for this young fox. If you don't mind trouble makers then he's the one for you.

Measurements 15 inches long, 10 inches from tail to toe.

This fox is made to order.

name: Christmas Stocking with Liam the Fox
description:
This listing is for a Liam the fox stocking

Measures approx 16 inches long

Made to order - please allow two weeks for production

~Handmade in California~

name: Sleepy Fall Bear Embroidery - Made to Order
description:
This sweet little bear will bring you joy every time you look at him hanging on your wall.

Perfect for a baby nursery, living room, office, (OR christmas tree!)

Measures 4 inches around - ready to hang
Made with dmc embroidery thread, organic linen and a wooden hoop. 

Made to order, please allow 3-5 weeks to create your order, plus additional time for delivery. If you want your order sooner, please ask.

name: Bella Bunny - Made to Order
description:
Bella Bunny is a mischievous little bunny, who will snatch the carrot sticks right off your plate when you aren't looking.She will entertain you, or your little one for hours on end with her long limbs and sweet facial expression. She is the type of doll to be loved for decades, handed down from one person to another.  

She is 19.5 inches long! A very leggy gal.

Her facial features are hand embroidered by me. She is made of organic linen, polka dot fabric, stuffed with polyfil and lots of love.

She fits perfectly in little arms, and makes for a lovely sleepy time companion.

*This listing is for the white bunny only, the red fox is sold separately in my shop*

- Sleepy King is a one person business - 
I hand-cut each part, hand embroider the facial features, sew each part together, stuff, and ship each item by myself. 

*She is "Made to order" Please allow 3-4 weeks to create, plus time for shipping*

~Handmade in California, USA~

name: Forrest the fox - Made to Order
description:
Forrest the fox spends his days playing pretty tunes on his harmonica, and dancing around his cabin. 
He will entertain you, or your little one for hours on end with his long limbs, swishy tail and sweet facial expression. He is the type of doll to be loved for decades, handed down from one person to another.

He measures approx 16.5 inches tall! A very leggy fellow!

Please allow 4-5 weeks for your order to be completed due to high demand. If you need your order sooner please contact me before purchasing to arrange for a quicker shipment.

His facial features, and tail are hand embroidered by me. He is made of organic linen, polka dot fabric, stuffed with polyfil and lots of love.

He fits perfectly in little arms, and makes for a lovely sleepy time companion.

*This listing is for the red fox only, the white bunny is available as a separate listing* 

- Sleepy King is a one person business - 
I hand-cut each part, hand embroider the facial features, sew each part together, stuff, and ship each item by myself.

~Handmade in California, USA~

name: Acorn the owl - Made to Order
description:
Acorn loves to fly around the forest and keep an eye on all of his woodland friends. After a long day of flying he likes to sit back in his rocking chair with a warm cup of peppermint tea and his favorite book about science. 

Acorn measures approx 8 inches tall. Stands on his own. Made of all new materials: Wool felt, dmc floss, poly fil and safey eyes.

Please allow 2-5 weeks for your order to be made and shipped due to high demand. If you need you order sooner, please ask before purchasing to make arrangements for quicker shipment.

name: Francis the owl - Made to Order
description:
Francis the owl loves to eat blueberries... blueberry pie, blueberry soup, blueberry tea, and blueberry loaf! He will never say no to a blueberry.

Francis stands on his own. He is made of high quality wool blend felt (made in USA), the detail on his wings is hand embroidered, he has two large child safety eyes, and a tag on the back that reads "Sleepy King"
He measures approx: 10 Inches tall

He is Made to order - please allow 2-4 weeks for your order to be made + additional time to ship.

~Made in California, USA~

name: Fig the fox - hand embroidered pillow - Made to order
description:
Fig the fox the hand embroidered pillow will add a bit of artsy flair to your couch, bed, chair, crib, or your baby nursery. You could even attach a string to this pillow and hang it on your wall! The possibilities are endless. I recommend putting this mini pillow in front of a larger pillow. 

I hand embroidered each stitch to create Fig the fox. He is 100% a original free form design, made without a pattern. 

This pillow is made of organic linen, polka dot cotton, and stuffed with polyfil. The back is a grey cotton blend.

Made to order! Please allow 4-5 weeks for delivery due to high demand. If you need a product sooner please ask, I can usually accommodate. 

~Handmade in California, USA ~

name: Bon Bon & Belchik Squirrel Pair - Made to Order
description:
Bon Bon and Belchik like to go on romantic picnics together in the forest. Belchik likes to surpirse Bon Bon with her favorite treat, a yummy acorn pie! They are true lovers and are never apart. <3

Measures approx 9 inches tall

 Bon Bon and Belchik are made of clean upcycled *tweed (tweed varies)
*I upcycle clean tweed for each pair of squirrels I make. Each pair will have the same features as these photos but will vary in tweed color and style. I always use beautiful brown/grey/dark tweeds from my collection. You will receive a beautiful pair of squirrels, but not the ones in the photos.*
Other materials include: fleece, safety eyes, hand embroidered facial features with DMC floss and stuffed with new poly fil.

Made to order, please allow 3-5 weeks for your order to be made and shipped. If you need your item sooner, please ask before purchasing.

name: Pierre the pug embroidery - Made to Order
description:
Pierre the pug will add a pop of color and CUTE to any room in your home or office.

This wall hanging is hand embroidered and is ready to hand.

Measures 4 inches 

Embroidered on mustard yellow organic linen, and polka dot fabric.

Made to order - Please allow 2-4 weeks for delivery due to high demand.
If you need a product sooner just ask, I can usually accommodate.
